attributes.action: ASK THE MINISTRY OF DEFENCE TO STOP KILLING ITS WAR DOGS
attributes.additional_details:
Having just been made aware of a hidious crime of over 600 war dogs being put to sleep by the MOD, we ask them to think again and have a shelter made to look after them , and also some would be able to be used as guard dogs surely!   They have fought for their country then just tossed aside... they did not chose to be in the Military, and then they are murdered..!!

   My father was a R. M, Commando, he would have been horrified by this, as indeed is everyone who has now heard about this...!!!
